In June last year, Google previewed a new second-screen experience for Google Meet called Companion Mode. Google then shared more details about the mode in September, revealing that it would let participants use their laptops or smart home devices as a second screen for a video call. The feature finally started rolling out to users

The post Teardown: Google Duo might get Meet’s Companion Mode soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A teardown of the latest version of Google Duo for Android has revealed that the app could get Google Meet's Companion Mode soon.
